body:
i'm thankful to have deleted the twitter app off my phone yet again.            

i'm thankful i filled my pill organizer for the week on monday before work.

i'm thankful for the reacji translation of "not the droids you're looking for" that i left in a slack thread about a bug that turned out not to be a bug and that the coworker who i was hoping would see it and enjoy it did.

i'm thankful that for another bug, which was actually a bug, i jumped on a call with a coworker in australia who i don't have face time with often and we got to chat a little bit and then i was able to figure out the issue.

i'm thankful that j, who has wanted a dog or some other pet for so long (i'm thankful to remember how she tried to befriend crows and raccoons when living in vancouver) but who hasn't been able to have one bc of her living situation, announced that she's getting a puppy next month and i was so overwhelmingly happy for her.

i'm thankful that i cuddled with miso last night when she was sleepy and she snored on my chest for a while. i'm thankful for the pajama sweat shirt i got from uniqlo, which is like wearing a fleece blanket as a sweat shirt.

i'm thankful for how miso chases her tail and will use me as something to brace herself against so that she can better reach it.

i'm thankful for the _you're wrong about_ podcast, which has always been great but which lately has been doing this in-depth series about the oj trial that, even though i watched that amazing massive documentary a few years ago, is so fascinating and is the podcast i look forward to most lately.

i'm thankful for central heating and i'm thankful for sandwiches.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful to have deleted the twitter app off my phone yet again.            

i'm thankful i filled my pill organizer for the week on monday before work.

i'm thankful for the reacji translation of "not the droids you're looking for" that i left in a slack thread about a bug that turned out not to be a bug and that the coworker who i was hoping would see it and enjoy it did.

i'm thankful that for another bug, which was actually a bug, i jumped on a call with a coworker in australia who i don't have face time with often and we got to chat a little bit and then i was able to figure out the issue.

i'm thankful that j, who has wanted a dog or some other pet for so long (i'm thankful to remember how she tried to befriend crows and raccoons when living in vancouver) but who hasn't been able to have one bc of her living situation, announced that she's getting a puppy next month and i was so overwhelmingly happy for her.

i'm thankful that i cuddled with miso last night when she was sleepy and she snored on my chest for a while. i'm thankful for the pajama sweat shirt i got from uniqlo, which is like wearing a fleece blanket as a sweat shirt.

i'm thankful for how miso chases her tail and will use me as something to brace herself against so that she can better reach it.

i'm thankful for the _you're wrong about_ podcast, which has always been great but which lately has been doing this in-depth series about the oj trial that, even though i watched that amazing massive documentary a few years ago, is so fascinating and is the podcast i look forward to most lately.

i'm thankful for central heating and i'm thankful for sandwiches.
